titleStmt.title: A declaration of the treaty at Newport in the Isle of VVight, between the Kings most Excellent Majesty, and the commissioners, declaring their unanimous and joyfull proceedings for peace, His Majesties signing the propositions, and knighting of Mr. Denzill Hollis, and Mr. Iohn Glyn, recorder of the City of London. With the Earl of Northumberlands declaration to the King, and His Majesties propositions in answer thereunto, and declaration concerning the Levellers of England.

A declaration of the treaty at Newport in the Isle of VVight, between the Kings most Excellent Majesty, and the commissioners, declaring their unanimous and joyfull proceedings for peace, His Majesties signing the propositions, and knighting of Mr. Denzill Hollis, and Mr. Iohn Glyn, recorder of the City of London. With the Earl of Northumberlands declaration to the King, and His Majesties propositions in answer thereunto, and declaration concerning the Levellers of England.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Northumberland, Algernon Percy, Earl of, 1602-1668.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
